36#include <config.h>
37
38#include <stdarg.h>
39#include <stdlib.h>
40#include <krb5/roken.h>
41
42struct rk_strpool {
43 char *str;
44 size_t len;
45};
46
47/*
48 *
49 */
50
51ROKEN_LIB_FUNCTION void ROKEN_LIB_CALL
52rk_strpoolfree(struct rk_strpool *p)
53{
54 if (p->str) {
55 free(p->str);
56 p->str = NULL;
57 }
58 free(p);
59}
60
61/*
62 *
63 */
64
65ROKEN_LIB_FUNCTION struct rk_strpool * ROKEN_LIB_CALL
66rk_strpoolprintf(struct rk_strpool *p, const char *fmt, ...)
67{
68 va_list ap;
69 char *str, *str2;
70 int len;
71
72 if (p == NULL) {
73 p = malloc(sizeof(*p));
74 if (p == NULL)
75 return NULL;
76 p->str = NULL;
77 p->len = 0;
78 }
79 va_start(ap, fmt);
80 len = vasprintf(&str, fmt, ap);
81 va_end(ap);
82 if (str == NULL) {
83 rk_strpoolfree(p);
84 return NULL;
85 }
86 str2 = realloc(p->str, len + p->len + 1);
87 if (str2 == NULL) {
88 rk_strpoolfree(p);
89 return NULL;
90 }
91 p->str = str2;
92 memcpy(p->str + p->len, str, len + 1);
93 p->len += len;
94 free(str);
95 return p;
96}
97
98/*
99 *
100 */
101
102ROKEN_LIB_FUNCTION char * ROKEN_LIB_CALL
103rk_strpoolcollect(struct rk_strpool *p)
104{
105 char *str;
106 if (p == NULL)
107 return strdup("");
108 str = p->str;
109 p->str = NULL;
110 free(p);
111 return str;
112}
